rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {02, 04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 06PGZA, 07, 07G, 07PG, 11, 42, 50PG, 56, 76, 78}

unitName: Educational research methods for the health professions
description: The unit focuses on research in contemporary health professional education. It will provide participants with the opportunity to develop foundation research skills and knowledge tailored to their teaching environment and/or interests.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
